startGame(bytes2,uint8,bytes32,bool[3]).details: START  . truct UserInfo { address payable gamerID; // User account address uint256 totalGameCount;  // to tracking recent GameResult. mapping (uint256 => GameResult) results; // start from 0 to N.... (game result log) bool isPlaying; bool isExistUser;       * truct GameResult { // use for game log! bytes32 gameHex; // use for transparency.
